interpretationNotes.weakLinks: Use weak-links logic: macro output can remain bottlenecked by non-automated tasks even when many tasks are automated.
interpretationNotes.policy: Escalate only when substitution speed clearly exceeds re-absorption speed and bottleneck indicators deteriorate together.

indicators.name: AI-job share vs non-AI white-collar share
Corporate 'AI efficiency + headcount discipline' guidance
indicators.trigger: Co-mention ratio rises for 2 consecutive quarters

indicators.name: Continuing claims
indicators.trigger: YoY turns positive and rises for 6 weeks

indicators.name: Upper-income consumption proxy
indicators.trigger: YoY flips negative and worsens for 2 months

indicators.name: Consumer credit delinquency
indicators.trigger: Rises for 2 quarters and > post-2021 mean +1 sigma

indicators.name: AI-linked capex momentum
indicators.proxy: Power grid / data center / semis / network capex trend
indicators.trigger: If broad AI capex growth >20% YoY for 2+ quarters, treat as re-absorption support

indicators.name: Real wage purchasing power
indicators.proxy: Real wage growth vs core service price trend
indicators.trigger: If real purchasing power improves for 3+ months, downgrade crisis pressure by one notch

indicators.name: Unemployment structure
indicators.trigger: If long-duration share rises persistently, confirms structural stress

indicators.name: Profit-investment coupling
indicators.proxy: Corporate margins vs business fixed investment
indicators.trigger: If margins rise without reinvestment, fragility risk rises; if both rise, industrial-transition path is healthier
